title: Gemma Collins stuns fans with her remarkable weight loss | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 58 shares Proud of her new look, she captioned the sensational snap: 'Love a Thursday night always a good night nearly the weekend wearing my TILLY DRESS an early pay day special girls Â£25.' While she may have thought she would get her followers going with her style specials, it was in fact Gemma's striking slimmed down appearance that got her fans talking. Then and now: The 36-year-old has undergone a major transformation (pictured on the left in 2015) Attracting over 6,000 likes, many of Gemma's followers were quick to comment on how fantastic the TV personality was looking. One said: 'Omg you have lost so much weight... looking so healthy congratulations @gemmacollins1.' Another wrote: 'Omg u look stunning! So slim, amazing. Keep up the great work'. While one user shared: 'Wow looking good Gemma xx'. Before another posted: 'U lost some weight. Love that pic xxx'. Displaying her incredible transformation, Gemma - who starred on ITV's Sugar Free Farm - was lauded with another stream of compliments as she a selfie of her sporting a sheer lace blue kimono. Chic: Displaying her incredible transformation, Gemma - who starred on ITV's Sugar Free Farm - was lauded with another stream of compliments as she a selfie of her sporting a sheer lace blue kimono Captioning the snap, she wrote: 'Love LACE morning ladies this look is great just with a bra or a vest top underneath navy with denim black with black jeans and white with white jeans you can also wear it over your swimming costume or bikini for summer GLAM.' Many commented alongside the pic, 'looking fantastic', 'beautiful' and 'gorgeous'. Her slimmed down appearance comes after she shared an image of her hand hooked up to a drip online earlier this month as she filmed the TOWIE Tenerife special. Celebrating her 36th birthday on the Canary Island's at the time, she captioned the worrying pic: 'What a way to spend your birthday.' Look at her now! Gemma shared a slimmed down snap of her modelling her latest design (Left). On the right, Gemma pictured in April 2016 The bubbly blonde appeared devastated by the event as she uploaded the photo, which appeared to see her lying on a hospital bed, for her fans. Explaining the situation, she wrote: 'Thank you for all your lovely messages sadly Im in hospital In Tenerife but hope to be on the mend soon,' followed by a teary emoji. Adding to her sadness, she finished the message on an even more melancholy note as she wrote: 'What a way to spend your birthday.' Looking well: Her slimmed down appearance comes after she shared an image of her hand hooked up to a drip online earlier this month as she filmed the TOWIE Tenerife special Fans immediately flocked to her social media page to wish her well in light of the unlucky event, with one writing: 'Get well soon chick' as another added: 'Hope you get better soon and can celebrate your birthday in style!' Gemma soared to fame in 2011 when she joined the ITVBe show in its second series, while still working as a car dealer, where she won over viewers with her larger-than-life persona and hilarious one liners - making Carol's outburst more shocking. While the reason behind her hospital visit remains unknown, the reality star was recently seen collapsing with fatigue during a recent episode of Sugar Free Farm. Gemma was left in such a state after her fruitless attempts of fishing, that she threw herself into the back of a truck and collapsed through sheer exhaustion. The star had appeared on the ITV show in a bid to combat her sugar intake and battle with yo-yo dieting. Upon arriving at the farm, she admitted to viewers: 'My lifestyle is out of control. The amount of money I spend on takeaways, I could probably buy a house by now.'
